titlestmt.subtitle: An Inventory
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Lindsay Morrone.

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-11-06T11:10-0500

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: The collection contains an assortment of newspapers from a variety of locations in New England, spanning the years 1873 to 1921.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Keeney Newspaper Collection contains a variety of newspapers from the late nineteenth and early twentieth century, with a focus on agriculture and domestic life.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains an assortment of newspapers from a variety of locations, spanning the years 1873 to 1921. While some of the titles in the collection contain only single issues, there are a few titles that contain numerous issues, including The Saturday Evening Post, the New England Homestead, the Connecticut Courant, and the Hartford Times. The newspapers in the collection also range from national publications, such as The Saturday Evening Post and the Ladies Home Companion, to regional farming journals, such as the New York Fireside Companion, the South Manchester News, and the The Metronome . There are also newspapers from various locations throughout New York state and New York City, Hartford, Connecticut, and Philadelphia.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Copyright Information
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

acqinfo.head: Provenance and Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were donated by Mr. Keeney of Manchester, CT, in 2001.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Keeney Newspaper Collection. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to various aspects of Connecticut history. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: [Subjects include: The American Garden, The Connecticut Farmer, The Farm Journal, Hallett's American Farmer, The Housewife, Ladies Home Companion, The Metronome (New York), Mirror and Farmer, The New England Homestead ( Springfield, Massachusetts), The New York Evening Journal, The New York Fireside Companion, The Rural New-Yorker, The Saturday Evening Post, The Voice (New York). ]
